item.title: Ideas for the future
item.description:
I want this blog to emulate some kind of old terminal, but still have a modern feel.

I want to add a border that looks like the Tekkit computer. I also want to add some pictures to the site. To preserve the old computer feel, I want to implement something similar to what George Galanakis has done in his blog post. Images would be black and white plus pixelated (maybe pixelation could be correlated to distance from the mouse or something). They could then be rendered normally on hover for info purposes.
